articles.title: China's retail sales rise by 4.9% in October, beat expectations - CGTN
articles.description: China's retail sales of consumer goods rose by 4.9 percent in October from a year earlier, while value-added industrial output went up by 3.5 percent year on year, data from the National Bureau of Statistics (NBS) showed Monday.
